synthesis_conditions.temperature_effect: Increasing the synthetic temperature was an approach to raise nucleation rate and facilitate the crystal growth process.
synthesis_conditions.solvent_dilution_effect: Diluting the system from 1 to 30 times, based on its primary synthetic condition, reduced the sizes of DPA-MOF from 190 to 45 nm.

synthesis_conditions.method: photo-oxygenation involving a [4++2]-cycloaddition of 1O2 on electron-rich carbon atoms of the anthracene-based linker
incorporation of TCPP into DPA-MOF through coordination to the Zr6 cluster
synthesis_conditions.oxygen_trapping_and_release: capable of trapping O2 in water upon visible light irradiation and releasing O2 under 254 nm UV irradiation
